title: cyrilmorris
author: cyrilmorris
content: Hello People,We are looking for moderators who can work for our ICO launch.We are looking for people who can work in exchange for our Token.The project Name is FinXCoin.We are partnering with various Industries and providing them Blockchain Solution.We have already partnered withOTT platform from USAEducational Institute in Central Asia.Payments and Healthcare applications in Kenya and other African Countries.We are going to implement our token into these applications as a medium of Transaction.Also we will partner with multiple Brands and provide them incentives to join us in this journey.So for now, we need people who can work as modetors and promote this project in exchange of Tokens.Project is on Binance.Address: 0x6BfB050a9Bec446a6A7BF49558f81DC8721248F1Yet to be luanched

comments.author: cyrilmorris
comments.body: Quote from: IIrik11 on April 05, 2023, 12:47:57 PMpromote where and how?Over the Forums and Community Channels

comments.author: Cryptpogz1
comments.body: How's your token on binance but you said that you haven't launched yet ?

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: You should move this on Altcoin Services board because you are paying in altcoin while this board only allow job offer that paid in Bitcoin.Also please indicate the exact website of your token to make a background on the project since you are paying on your native token that doesn’t guarantee any value in the future to pay the initial services from the user that will apply for this moderator job.I’m confused on the job description. Moderator typically moderate community and not promoting to various channel. I think you should be looking for an ambassador of your project rather than a moderator if the main task is for promotion.
